questions.question: When you boil water, the particles...

choices.answer: Slow down
Clump together
Stop moving completely
Move faster and start spreading out

questions.question: Which chunk of butter will completely melt FIRST in the hot pan?

choices.answer: Chunk 1
Chunk 2
They will completely melt at the same time

questions.question: How do you find the average (or mean)?

choices.answer: add all the numbers
subtract the smallest number from the biggest number
add all the numbers & divide by how many numbers there were

questions.question: How should we work together in groups?

choices.answer: One person should do the work as fast as they can
Everyone should take turns sharing ideas and listening
Divide up the work to make it go faster

questions.question: What should your group do when you get stuck?

choices.answer: Wait for Ms. Sheffels to tell you what to do
Give up and sit in silence :/
Ask each other specific questions and see if anyone has an idea

questions.question: What do great mathematicians do? (Pick the best answer)

choices.answer: Look for patterns, ask questions, and think deeply
Get every single answer exactly right
Memorize rules without understanding why they work

questions.question: If you have struggled with math in the past...

choices.answer: That's ok!!! We are all here to learn, and I don't expect you to be perfect
Don't click blue lol

questions.question: What should you do if you didn't quite finish your Unsheltered in SF Project?

choices.answer: Ignore it and pretend it never happened
Give up, it's too late
Finish it today or this week!

questions.question: We are about to start a new unit about voting. Which answer best describes the U.S. voting system?

choices.answer: Citizens vote on every law to decide if it should pass
Citizens vote for politicians to represent them and vote on laws

questions.question: How do presidential candidates win elections?

choices.answer: If they receive more than 50% of the citizens votes
If they receive more than 50% of the Electoral College votes
If they say that they won very loudly
